item.title: Iced Nannari Sherbet
item.description: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading 2tbsp Nannari Syrup per serving 1 Handful basil leaves Lime slices (garnish) Juice of 1-2 limes Crushed ice Rose syrup (optional) Directions Add 8 tbsp syrup and 6 cups water to jug Add juice of 2 limes and stir Add crushed ice and basil leaves, shake. Optional: add a tsp of rose syrup at bottom of glass Pour shaken drinks, garnish with fresh lime Footnotes Nannari Sherbet is a popular drink in India, particularly over the hot summers.

item.title: Aloo Besan Wrap
item.description: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading 1 large potato 1 medium Cauliflower 1 2 tbsp Chickpea Flour (Besan) 3-5 Roti / Tortilla (Wrap) 1 bunch Cilantro (small) 1 tsp cumin seeds 1 tbsp oil 1 small green chilli 1 small piece of ginger Directions Chop 1 large potato into chunks Microwave in covered bowl for 3 minutes on high Wash 1 head of cauliflower, chop into florets. Peel 1 small piece of ginger, mince.
